verses.name: 1 Kings 8:12
verses.text: Then spake Solomon, The Lord said that he would dwell in the thick darkness.

verses.name: 1 Kings 8:13
verses.text: I have surely built thee an house to dwell in, a settled place for thee to abide in for ever.

verses.name: 1 Kings 8:14
verses.text: And the king turned his face about, and blessed all the congregation of Israel: (and all the congregation of Israel stood;)

verses.name: 1 Kings 8:15
verses.text: And he said, Blessed be the Lord God of Israel, which spake with his mouth unto David my father, and hath with his hand fulfilled it, saying,
